title: Couple With Heart: Person, Man, Medium Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple with heart (person, man, medium skin tone)
description: Represents a loving romantic relationship between a person and a man, with a heart symbolizing their affection. The specific skin tone indicates a medium complexion.
apple_vendor_description: The 'couple with heart' emoji, specifically depicting a person and a woman with medium skin tones on Apple devices, is a tender representation of love and partnership. Apple's design language imbues the figures with a gentle, approachable style, featuring soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading that adds warmth and dimension. The central heart, glowing with realistic lighting, radiates affection, making this emoji on Apple devices a beautiful and inclusive way to express romantic love, deep connection, or strong emotional bonds between two individuals.
